caption: After Polidoro Caldara, called Polidoro da Caravaggio (Italian, 1499 - 1543), Seated prisoners sleeping, from a frieze on the Facade of the Palazzo Ricci, Rome. Brush and brown wash, heightened with white on cream laid paper, laid down to collector's mount; 14.2 x 19.3 cm. Bequest of Dan Fellows Platt, Class of 1895 (x1948-665)
